author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Brisbane Festival, Queensland's premier annual arts festivalTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Brisbane Festival, Queensland’s premier annual arts festival Published on : Monday, September 21, 2015
Queensland’s premier annual arts festival, Brisbane Festival presents a diverse program of over 100 local, national and international artists, world premiere productions, the independent, cutting edge and offbeat.
This year, the ongoing Brisbane Festival has an exciting program full of music, comedy, theatre, dance, opera, circus and more till 26 September.
Peter Sellers teams up with some serious Flex dancers in the bone-breaking USA hit FLEXN. Check out the striking adaptation of Verdi’s opera Macbeth along with the mad and defiant party, Coup Fatal, both set in the Congo. Don’t miss the flying circus spectacular FLOWN at The Courier-Mail Piazza and head on down to Arcadia, the new fantastical Festival Village at South Bank, for the delicious and decadent shows Club Swizzle and Fear & Delight.
